<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">293b3c61e1bd0210c6b44a42c89afcd9</macroponent><name>setFeedbackReason</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var selectedReasons = [];
    selectedReasons.push(event.payload.item.id);
    api.setState("selectedReason", () => selectedReasons);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-26 00:27:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>a13b3c61d5bd021059dd14fa6833b4d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setFeedbackReason</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DropshipNow" source="x_cdltd_dropship_0">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DropshipNow">c50b38615cbd02107f44e00391646b2b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a13b3c61d5bd021059dd14fa6833b4d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-26 00:27:12</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
